'''Hilichurl Chieftain Hall''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Hilichurl Chieftain Hall is obtainable from [[Tubby]] for reaching [[Trust Rank]] 9.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=90}}.
{{Recipe
|type = Creation
|time = 16h
|Birch Wood = 30
|sort = Birch Wood
}}
